name: layoutManager(_:shouldUseTemporaryAttributes:forDrawingToScreen:atCharacterIndex:effectiveRange:)
desc: Asks the delegate whether to use temporary attributes when drawing the text.
declaration:
optional func layoutManager(_ layoutManager: NSLayoutManager, 
shouldUseTemporaryAttributes attrs: [NSAttributedString.Key : Any] = [:], 
         forDrawingToScreen toScreen: Bool, 
           atCharacterIndex charIndex: Int, 
             effectiveRange effectiveCharRange: NSRangePointer?) -> [NSAttributedString.Key : Any]?
